effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets reflect on the user’s side of the field.

effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets reflect on the user’s side of the field.
effect.legends_za: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets reflect on the user’s side of the field.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Sets Reflect on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Sets Reflect on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Sets Reflect on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
short_effect.legends_za: Sets Reflect on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.
